affiliation_name: Centre virtuel de la connaissance sur l'Europe
overview:
Frederic Allemand is Researcher in European law and expert in the field of Economic governance. He is also lecturer in EU law in serveral French “Grandes Ecoles” (University level) such as Sciences Po Paris (Political Sciences Institute), Ecole nationale d’administration (school for high level civil servants), ESCP-Europe and HEC (Business schools).

As Researcher, Frederic Allemand is currently managing two three-years projects on the EU law for a Luxembourg-based public research center. He worked previously at the European Central Bank, the French Senate and in several French think tanks.

He is the author of more than thirty articles published in scientific journals.

firm.name: Centre virtuel de la connaissance sur l'Europe
